leo_dagum wrote:
> I need help with a simple user question. I'd like to crawl only
> html/doc/pdf files. I created a filter to allow only files with the
> corresponding extensions, however it results in filtering out uri's
> with implicit 'index.html' in them. What is the correct way to
> restrict my crawl to this subset of file types?

Additionally you might want to read A.2 and A.3 of the Heririx user's 
manual:

http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/usecases.html

Regards,
Frank
